sentences.en: At first, he could not get rid of a culpable sense of licence on his part.
sentences.cn: 刚开始, 就他这方面来讲,他对自己的放纵抱有一种难以摆脱的负疚感.

sentences.en: Both parties were held to be to some extent culpable.
sentences.cn: 双方都被追究了一定的责任。
布鲁克实在是罪魁祸首.

sentences.en: I cannot be held culpable ( for their mistakes ).
sentences.cn: 不能 ( 把他们的错误 ) 归咎于我.

sentences.en: I would not be culpable for dividing and restricting computer users, but it would happen nonetheless.
sentences.cn: 我将不会因分开和限制计算机用户而被指责, 虽然如此,这种情形会继续发生.

sentences.en: If we had gone about trying to get that prize, we would have been culpable.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不尽力去实现这个目标, 我们就会受到惩罚.

sentences.en: Just as there can be culpable omissions , so too can there be blameless acts.
sentences.cn: 正如因未履行某种职责受到处罚一样, 人也可能因干了某事而不受责难.

sentences.en: One is to cushion the blow to families and communities, even if some are culpable.
sentences.cn: 一是减轻对家庭和社区的打击, 尽管有些家庭和社区自己也难辞其疚.

sentences.en: The judge found the man culpable.
Their decision to do nothing makes them culpable.
sentences.cn: 他们不采取任何行动的决定使他们难辞其咎。

sentences.en: They held him culpable for the offence.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他有罪应受惩罚.

sentences.en: We are ourselves partly culpable for the state of events.
sentences.cn: 事情发展到现在这个地步,我们自己应担负一部分责任.

trans.tran_cn: 应受谴责的，应受处罚的，有罪的
trans.tran_en: a culpable action is one that is considered criminal
